ERROR_NOT_DESKTOP: The administration interface must be run from a desktop computer.
ADMIN_SITE_SETUP_DESCRIPTION: The following values affect basic site behavior.
ADMIN_SITE_SETUP_SITE_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Name of this website as it appears in the website, including in the "Return to [site-name] home" link in the footer
ADMIN_SITE_SETUP_ORGANIZATION_NAME_DESCR: Name of the organization that owns this site.
ADMIN_SITE_SETUP_LOCAL_AREA_CODE_DESCRIP: Area code for local phone numbers. Added to phone numbers that are missing an area code.
ADMIN_SITE_SETUP_AUTODETECT_PHONE_DESCRI: On some web browsers (e.g., iOS), phone numbers are automatically detected and turned into tappable or clickable links. Uncheck this box to disable this behavior site-wide.
ADMIN_SITE_MODULES_DESCRIPTION: Behavior related to the loading of modules
ADMIN_SITE_MODULES_DYNAMIC_NAV_DATA_DESC: When enabled, module's navigation data can be dynamic by using a subclass method. This only has effect if you have subclassed the built in modules. See Developer's Guide for more information. This is an advanced option and should be left off for performance reasons if you do not utilize this feature.
ADMIN_SITE_MODULES_CREATE_DEFAULT_CONFIG: When enabled, if a module is loaded and there is no configuration folder, it will be created with the default. This should normally be off to prevent unnecessary creation of unneeded folders by unused modules.
ADMIN_SITE_THEME_DESCRIPTION: Select the visual theme for the site. For more information about creating and modifying themes, see the developer documentation.
ADMIN_SITE_DETECTION_DESCRIPTION: The device detection service recognizes and categorizes each user's web browser so that the appropriate class of web UI can be delivered. You can run this service on your own web server, or use an externally hosted one such as the reference service provided by Modo Labs.
ADMIN_SITE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: For optimal runtime performance and security, disable as many types of debugging as possible.
ADMIN_SITE_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: Specify how long different types of cookies will be set to persist in each user's browser. By default these cookies are short lived. For production sites, you should increase the time so users' preferences persist longer.
ADMIN_SITE_STRINGS_DESCRIPTION: These string values are used throughout the site
ADMIN_SITE_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION: Various site maintenance actions and utilities
ADMIN_MODULES_OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Use this section to view and manage the overall properties of each module.
ADMIN_MODULES_OVERVIEW_ID_DESCRIPTION: The unique internal module ID. This can only be changed in the source code.
ADMIN_MODULES_OVERVIEW_ENABLED_DESCRIPTI: Module is active for this site.
ADMIN_MODULES_OVERVIEW_HOME_DESCRIPTION: Module is featured on the home screen.
ADMIN_MODULES_OVERVIEW_FEDSEARCH_DESCRIP: Module's contents are included in site-wide federated search.
ADMIN_MODULES_HOMESCREEN_DESCRIPTION: Use this section to manage the modules that appear on the home screen. Primary modules appear larger and can be hidden by users using the Customize module. Secondary modules appear smaller and cannot be removed or rearranged by users. You can also update the label of each module as it appears on the home screen. To remove a module, drag it to the unused modules section.
